item.title: GSA erases public list of federal properties to be sold
item.description: The General Services Administration already has removed an online list of more than 400 "non-core" federal properties it said it wanted to sell off.

item.title: Texas Democrat Rep. Sylvester Turner, 70, dies two months into first congressional term
item.description: Rep. Sylvester Turner, Texas Democrat and former mayor of Houston, died suddenly at age 70, just two months into his first congressional term.

item.title: Federal watchdog blocks Trump's firing of thousands at Agriculture Department

item.title: 'No quid pro quo': NYC Mayor Adams tells Congress he didn't strike deal with Trump
item.description: New York Mayor Eric Adams told Congress under oath on Wednesday that his new stance on illegal immigrants isn't the result of any deal with the Trump ...

item.title: 'Bear with me,' Trump says as both farmers and consumers brace for tariff effects
